description: Comprehensive business analytics data models using Freezed for immutable data structures

components.ReportData: Base union type for all business report data with specialized report types (revenue, service performance, technician metrics, customer analytics, appointment analytics, payment analytics).

components.DailyRevenue: Daily revenue tracking with date, revenue amount, and service count.

components.ServiceRevenue: Service-specific revenue metrics including percentage contribution and booking count.

components.ServiceMetrics: Comprehensive service performance metrics including bookings, revenue, ratings, and duration.

components.ServiceTrend: Service trend analysis with data points and growth rate calculations.

components.TechnicianMetrics: Technician performance analytics including appointments, revenue, ratings, and utilization rate.

components.TechnicianRevenue: Technician revenue tracking with daily breakdown and total earnings.

components.CustomerSegment: Customer segmentation analysis with count, percentage, and average spending patterns.

components.CustomerRetention: Monthly customer retention analytics with new vs returning customer metrics.

components.HourlyBooking: Hour-by-hour booking pattern analysis for operational insights.

components.AppointmentType: Appointment type distribution analysis for service categorization.

components.PaymentTrend: Payment method trend analysis with temporal data and payment preferences.

components.TrendPoint: Generic trend data point with date and value for various analytics.

rules: Comprehensive business intelligence data models supporting full POS analytics suite.
Freezed immutable data structures with JSON serialization for data persistence and API integration.
Union types with factory constructors for type-safe report data handling across different business domains.
Revenue analytics supporting daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly revenue tracking with service breakdown.
Service performance metrics including booking frequency, revenue generation, customer ratings, and trend analysis.
Technician performance tracking with utilization rates, revenue attribution, and productivity metrics.
Customer analytics supporting segmentation, retention analysis, and lifetime value calculations.
Appointment analytics with booking patterns, show-up rates, and operational efficiency metrics.
Payment analytics supporting multiple payment methods, transaction analysis, and tip tracking.
Time-based trend analysis supporting various data visualization and business forecasting needs.
Enum support for report types (revenue, service performance, technician performance, customer analytics, appointment analytics, payment analytics).
Time range enumeration supporting flexible reporting periods (today, yesterday, weekly, monthly, yearly, custom).
JSON serialization support for data export, API integration, and persistent report caching.
